HTMLOptionElementSelected.summary: The selected property of the interface specifies the current selectedness of the element; that is, whether the {{HTMLElement("option")}} is selected or not.

remarks.para: The presence of the HTML selected attribute indicates the option is selected by default. It does not indicate whether this option is currently selected: if the option's state changes, the selected content attribute does not reflect the change; only the HTMLOptionElement's selected IDL property is updated. The selected attribute is reflected by the property.
